actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide financial assistance to the Accokeek Foundation in the operation of the National Colonial Farm, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to cooperate with the Accokeek Foundation in the operation and maintenance of the National Colonial Farm, Accokeek, Maryland, and to make available to the Foundation the funds appropriated to the Secretary for the operation and maintenance of the farm.

titles.title: A bill to provide financial assistance to the Accokeek Foundation in the operation of the National Colonial Farm, and for other purposes.
